title: Speak the Spire
description:
Voice commands for Slay the Spire!

To install this mod you will need to install Talon first, a speech engine and framework. Detailed instructions can be found here: https://github.com/brollin/speak-the-spire-talon/blob/main/README.md

Special thanks to Mjonkey for the help working out some early issues on Windows!
changeNote: v0.3.0: voice commands for setting ascension level
